relnotes.name: Secure Software Install
relnotes.purpose: Implements the installation, uninstallation, backup and restore of native applications.

deliverystep.name: PREQ2344 Install only device exact match languages from SIS files

preq.title: Install only device exact match languages from SIS files

deliverystep.preq: Install only device exact match languages from SIS files

defect.title: WDP: RBS feature is failing

relnotes.defect: WDP: RBS feature is failing is fixed

defect.title: Not possible to uninstall a sis package that is installed to a memory card

relnotes.defect: Continue uninstallation even media card is corrupted . .

defect.title: TRUE - GSM - Out of memory issues

relnotes.defect: TRUE - GSM - Out of memory issues are fixed.

defect.title: Pre-installed backed up content cannot be restored

relnotes.defect: instead of opening multiple sessions with SisRegistry we make use of subsessions .

defect.title: published header file is #including an inaccessible header file

relnotes.defect: published header file is #including an inaccessible header file issue is fixed .

defect.title: dbtool should be renamed to scrtool

relnotes.defect: dbtool is renamed to scrtool .

defect.title: Swi::RSisRegistrySession::RemovablePackagesL() leaves with -4 (KErrNoMemory) in

relnotes.defect: Fixed MEMORY LEAK IN SisRegistry server.

defect.title: SWAP_Wordscan errors in MCL

relnotes.defect: Fixed word scan issues.

defect.title: Pre-installed backed up content cannot be restored

relnotes.defect: A new feature has been added to SWI that allows a backup of an application to overwrite an application on the device if it already exists.The fix also includes improvements to the DEBUG logging for restore and fixes for some partial upgrade edge cases.This was also properly fixes a much older defect PDEF091134.

defect.title: tresetdevice fails under CS2 on h4

relnotes.defect: Added automatic creation of directory :\tswi\tbackuprestore in the test harness.

defect.title: SWI PC tools do not handle capabilities correctly under Linux

relnotes.defect: Function "CSISCapabilities::ExtractCapabilities" is modified to work for Linux as well.

defect.title: interpretsis fails with unknown error with attached sis file

relnotes.defect: Set the logo attributes before moving on to the next token.

defect.title: makesis: display the wrong line-number when file is missing

relnotes.defect: displaying the wrong line-number when file is missing issue is fixed.

defect.title: Performance in RSisRegistryEntry::InstalledDrivesL is low

relnotes.defect: Modified SCR interface to allow avoiding drive management when registering a file.

defect.title: tsishelper.htm fails with KErrInUse

relnotes.defect: tsishelper.htm now passes.

defect.title: A previously restored PU upgraded application does not get backed up again

relnotes.defect: Previously restored PU upgraded application is getting backed up.

defect.title: SMPSAFE MMP file updates for SWI and USIF

relnotes.defect: updated MMP files for SWI and USIF components to declare them SMPSAFE

deliverystep.name: CR1125:Security: New SIS Package Run Option to Launch After Installation Completed

cr.title: New SIS Package Run Option to Launch After Installation Completed

deliverystep.cr: New SIS Package Run Option to Launch After Installation Completed

defect.title: tsisregistrytest , tsis_rollback and tsts_tintegrityservices failing in onb

relnotes.defect: For tintegrityservices, reduced the log string to avoid the TEF defect. For swiregistry, increased the performance target

defect.title: [WDP] tsisstub_delete.script fail due to TEF time out

relnotes.defect: Fixed time out issues.

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK -security/swi

relnotes.defect: Coverity Issues are fixed.

defect.title: CLogFileVersion class should be internal

relnotes.defect: Changed CLogFileVersion class classification to internalComponent.

defect.title: KUidSwiProgress shouldn't be visible in 9.5

relnotes.defect: Added proper #ifdef-s

defect.title: Platsec Error raised by SWI Observer when invoked by SWI Daemon

relnotes.defect: No new security test case was added, as testing RSwiObserver classes would require swicaptests to link swiobserverclient.lib and swibservereddata.lib which don't have several capabilities, and couldn't be loaded. Without swicaptests, the cost of adding new test cases would be too high with low benefit of capturing regressions.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Indication of executable code
deliverystep.preq: Incudes changes to enable the installer to indicate that the software component has an executable, before the installation takes place.

defect.title: TZ server new dependency with swiobserver (part of swi.iby

relnotes.defect: As Swi.iby is dependent on many other .iby. So move all dll related to swi observer from swi.iby and place in some other .iby (swiobserver.iby). Other team are interested on swi observer only. Instead of including whole swi.iby other people can include swiobserver.iby.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Plugin management and highly desirable features (Phase 2)
deliverystep.preq: 1) Post-manufacture plugin management 2) Complex queries in the SCR 3) Additional smaller requirements and changes and 4) Improved security in the SCR

defect.title: Crash in integrityservices component during repeated power on/off test

relnotes.defect: Drive boundary check added to function CJournal::RefreshDrivesArrayL

defect.title: swiobservertestoom.exe fails from M04646 with USER::PANIC 84

relnotes.defect: Remove the false panic when the test failed. The summery at the end of the tests should be way to indicate any failures

defect.title: RSisRegistrySession::RemovablePackages does not return all removable packages

relnotes.defect: RSisRegistrySession::RemovablePackagesL returns now also SP packages

defect.title: PREQ1269 - Application Manager is unresponsive

relnotes.defect: Added caching for the CComponentEntry object in the subsession. Improved the performance of RSisRegistryEntry::OpenL. Several other minor improvements.

defect.title: PREQ1269 - SCR database consumes much more disk space than SIS Registry

relnotes.defect: As N- series devices tend to have many in ROM components, most settings in the SCR DB were changed to favour ROM components as the default settings. Additionally, more settings were made optional for all components (index etc.)

defect.title: PREQ1269 - Processing of ROM stubs is very slow

relnotes.defect: Removing queries while adding files. Improving bitmask management for installed drives. Making more properties optional. Made default options to favour ROM components.

defect.title: PREQ1269: Read-Write lock fails

relnotes.defect: State variables were moved to the sub-session class instead of CRequestImpl class. This way the state is not shared across sub-sessions.

defect.title: RSwiObserverSession::ProcessLogs accesses data caged files on client side

relnotes.defect: SWiobserver now maintains a flag file in tmp to show wheter there any any logfiles to proces

defect.title: [Coverity]-SYMBIAN.CLEANUP_STACK-security/swi

relnotes.defect: Fixes to various coverity issues in SWI.

defect.title: TRUE - Can't install apps from Download! application

relnotes.defect: Nonsecure clock will be used if secure clock is not available.

defect.title: Non-DP Roms can not build in ONB

relnotes.defect: Included rom dependencies for non-dp textshell rom and mcs

defect.title: Coverity issues in swi

relnotes.defect: Coverity errors fixed in swi

defect.title: Sisregistry tests fail after JMI is removed

relnotes.defect: Remove the dependency on MIDP.sis from sisregistry test

deliverystep.name: PREQ1269: Crypto Services: Core Delivery
deliverystep.preq: Delivers the main set of features for the Diran Early Phase. Includes the new components (SCR, SIF and STS), migration of the native installer to use the new components and most reference code. Excludes non-mandatory features and post-production plugin management.

defect.title: Games are not restored, 'Application closed: !InstallServer' systerm error is di

relnotes.defect: * Fixed the restore processor to ensure that the hash of the current controller object used the correct raw controller buffer as input. * Fixed the backupsession to allow partial upgrades to ROM stubs to be backed up. * Fixed the restore controller code that matches the list of backed up files against controller to cope with the system drive symbol ($) and the code used for no user-selected drive (255) * Fixed the restore processor to preserve the IsInRom flag on partial upgrades to be preserved so that this is consistent with the installer code. Otherwise, restored upgrades to ROM stubs can magically become non-removable.

defect.title: Incorrect orphaned file checking during uninstall

relnotes.defect: Break has been added to exit from the inner loop once an entry was found and removed.

defect.title: Unable to upgrade ROM based UI application by installing new version to removabl

relnotes.defect: SidToFileNameL returns correct drive

defect.title: Change the reference in security to use new IWS RExplicitHttpSession

relnotes.defect: Reference in security changed to use new IWS RExplicitHttpSession

defect.title: Fix copyright errors

relnotes.defect: Copy Right headers has been added in the files.

defect.title: Category G ipr in security code needs to be confirmed or changed

relnotes.defect: Category G ipr in security code confirmed only for reccafconfig and other code changed to category T

defect.title: Flash sis installation is not successfull in the first attempt

relnotes.defect: The integrity services code now creates backups of executables in sys\bin using CFileMan::Copy instead of renaming the file. This allows the original file to be safely deleted using RLoader::Delete

defect.title: Cannot eclipse epoc exe's with a patch

relnotes.defect: Condition has been added to eclipse epoc exe's (executables) with a patch.

defect.title: [coverity] - CHECKED_RETURN - security/swi/source/sislauncher/

relnotes.defect: CID768 - Tagging this defect as intentional. CID767 - Modified Swi::CSisLauncherSession::RunExecutableL() to check the error code returned.

defect.title: Large SIS files can cause internal overflows and install failures

relnotes.defect: The lengths of IPC messages in the SIS launcher are now stored in TInt instead of TUint8 variables to prevent overflows.

defect.title: Uninstallation of base package does not remove non-removable patches.

relnotes.defect: When an SA package is removed the associated SP patches are removed even if the SP is marked as non-removable.

defect.title: RSisRegistrySession::RecoverL capability checks

relnotes.defect: RSisRegistrySession::RecoverL API now is checked for the SWI daemon UID.

defect.title: Unable to install SIS packages when the corresponding root certificate is marked

relnotes.defect: SA SU sis files without RU flag are dealt as normal SA sis files.

defect.title: [coverity] - sisxrecognizer -BAD_OVERRIDE

relnotes.defect: sisxrecognizer BAD_OVERRIDE coverity issue fixed

defect.title: Testdependencies.script failing

relnotes.defect: Testdependencies.script is now successfully passing

defect.title: Incorrect data caging path checking in Restore Controller

relnotes.defect: Data cage path checking corrected in Restore Controller

defect.title: SWI: PU elcipse

relnotes.defect: Allowed a PU package to eclipse files in an SA package.

defect.title: [Coverity-Blr][connect_chk][1] : Swi::RSwiObserverSession::Connect() return val

relnotes.defect: Added error checking to server connection call.

defect.title: Vulnerability of code signing applications to chosen-prefix collisions for MD5

relnotes.defect: Support of MD2 and MD5 signatures on sis file controllers has been removed.

defect.title: SWI application in use check does not work if there are more than 32 UIDs

relnotes.defect: Updated checks for application in use to allow more than 32 UIDs.

defect.title: Incorrect behaviour exhibited by CSisRegistryCache::EmbeddingPackagesL() API

relnotes.defect: Embedding packages can now be correctly found using sisregistry.

defect.title: TextSkip flag not implemented in SWI

relnotes.defect: TextSkip option which displays a message then skips the installation of the next file in the package was implemented in SWI

defect.title: The installed theme in used is corrupted after try to uninstalling it.

relnotes.defect: Extended sis registry cache re-generation to apply to cancellation of a confirmed un-installation as well as installation.

defect.title: Debug message in SisRegistryServer is misleading

relnotes.defect: Change message in second debug statement.

defect.title: RSisRegistryEntry::DependentPackagesL should not return augmentations

relnotes.defect: update documentation for RSisRegistryEntry::DependentPackagesL and RSisRegistryEntry::DependenciesL

defect.title: SWI run-on-install flag does not work for pre-installed applications

relnotes.defect: Run-on-install does work for pre-installed applications.

defect.title: Equal error constants in SWI

relnotes.defect: The error code for KErrSISInfoMissingRemoveDirectories is changed to -10148

defect.title: InterpretSis generates v4 SisregistryObject contains v5 data

relnotes.defect: IsRemoved field will no longer appear in v4 sisregistryObject. In addition, version number for v4 sisregistryObject is now 4.0 instead of 4.1

defect.title: installed themes cannot be shown on theme settings

relnotes.defect: More than 10 themes can now be displayed in themes list

devcr.title: Add internal media propagation to PREQ1912

relnotes.devcr: Add internal media propagation to PREQ1912

defect.title: Installer is very slow because all stub sis-packages are read from rom twice in

relnotes.defect: check pUid only to determine if a package is in Rom. Read pUid from a specific position in rom stub sis file instead of parsing all the controller info. If an exe is rom based is checked by querying SidCache instead of scanning all the rom stub sis file

deliverystep.name: CR1125:Crypto Services:Add Package Versions to SIS File Conditionals

cr.title: Add Package Versions to SIS File Conditionals

deliverystep.cr: Add Package Versions to SIS File Conditionals

cr.title: Allow Certificate Validity Dates to be Ignored when Verifying SIS Controllers

relnotes.cr: Added a new Sis Registry API to check the integrity of installed applications without requiring that the signing certificate chain be valid for the current date and time.

devcr.title: Add access to the list of EmbeddedPackages from the published interface

relnotes.devcr: Add access to the list of EmbeddedPackages from the published interface

defect.title: SWI should limit user-grantable capabilities

relnotes.defect: A validation has been added such that, AllFiles, CommDD, MultimediaDD, NetworkControl, DiskAdmin. can not be configured as user grantable from SWI policy INI file.

defect.title: SIS recongnizer should also check file extension while recognizing sis files

relnotes.defect: Added a patchable constant: KSisxRecognizerConst to recsisx.dll. With KSisxRecognizerConst set to non-zero, the SIS recogniser would return ECertain for .sis, EPossible for .sisx and ENotRecognized for all other extensions.

defect.title: Invalid version checking when using the '==' operator (TCheckedVersion)

relnotes.defect: TCheckedVersion "==" operator logic fixed

defect.title: Include file name should be case sensitive

relnotes.defect: Change included header file name to lower case.

defect.title: Cannot install adorned filename

relnotes.defect: Swi's adorned filename handling mechanism has been refined.

defect.title: Installation problems with rom upgrades when using SA packages (with RU flag)

relnotes.defect: PackageExistsInRomL() should search by pkg UID - which is unique - instead of pkg name.

defect.title: Wrong error code when installing an embedded SIS consisting a patch file

relnotes.defect: The error code has been changed to KErrMissingBasePackage (-10255) in installationprocessor.cpp

defect.title: SWI does not delete files on removable media on propagated app uninstall

relnotes.defect: SWI delete files on removable media on propagated app uninstall

defect.title: PackageExistsInRomL() doesn't implemented completed

relnotes.defect: The PackageUid has been passed to the CheckIfMatchingStubFileL for checking the PackageUid when we install a SA package with RU flag.

defect.title: SWI stops any install/uninstall after a failed uninstall under low RAM

relnotes.defect: Creation of templog.txt is been done through Replace API instead of Create API.

defect.title: Security checks during propgation are inconsistent with checks during restore

relnotes.defect: Modify installer to allow the installation of propagations where some of the files have been modified as long as the modified files do not exist under /sys or /resource and do not have the VERIFY tag set in the package file.

defect.title: SisRegistryServer panics with KERN-EXEC 3

relnotes.defect: Reduced stack usage in integrityservices and sisregistryserver by using heap storage for local variables.

defect.title: SWI completes the installation despite the files not being installed

relnotes.defect: makesis tool will report error for file name which exceeds a pre-defined value (KMaxFileName), instead of cutting it off silently.

defect.title: SA fails to install, PU installs ok

relnotes.defect: In SecurityCheckUtil::ProcessFileL(), check whether the installing app's SID is cached or not.

defect.title: SWI certification validation does not use secure time

relnotes.defect: When SWI validates a certificate chain, it now uses secure time rather than local time.

defect.title: swipolicy.ini needs to default to true for fix to DEF096906

relnotes.defect: The default setting of "RemoveOnlyWithLastDependent" in swipolicy.ini has been changed to TRUE.

defect.title: RSisRegistryEntry::FilesL uses too much memory for large SIS files

relnotes.defect: Optimise the memory usage of RSisRegistryEntry::FilesL().

defect.title: Test Improvment - Allow SWI tests to run in startupmode=1 on the emulator

relnotes.defect: Allow SWI tests to run in startupmode=1 on the emulator.

defect.title: RCA (preRCA036): .sis installation crash

relnotes.defect: Before we attempt to open the backup.lst in InitFromBackupL(), we re-name it. This will act as a flag to specify whether a read was successful or not. So the next time the SisRegistry is opened, we check the flag, and delete the renamed, corrupted backup.lst file.

defect.title: Frozen/Blank screen after declining installation from inbox

relnotes.defect: Dont regenerate the cache if the user cancels out of confirmation dialog. A further check is made to ensure the registry has not been changed if the user has entered the confirmation state at least once (for embedded packages).

defect.title: SISHelper capability policing does not match documentation

relnotes.defect: Change the policy table so that sishelper will police the SID of calling client to ensure that only InstallServer can use sishelper.

defect.title: The length of embedded sis's controller in sis registry is wrong

relnotes.defect: The controller hash stored in the sisregistry is generated from the controller data fields only (minus SISSignatueCertificateChain's and SISDataIndex). As a result, once the user allow the first installation of a package to the media card (e.g. signed by Vodafone), user can then pop in another media card which contains the installation of the same package but signed differently (e.g. signed by Orange), and the device should still pick up the installed package; as both hashes are the same. CSisRegistryObject version had been increment to 5.2. Exported a new sisregistry_5.2.txt to z:/system/install/ to indicate the CSisRegistryObject version. This defect fix would impact Interpretsis, i.e. Interpretsis need to generate the v5.2 sisregistry hash.

defect.title: It is not possible to abort an installation without causing an error.

relnotes.defect: A new text option FA is added , which results in SWI aborting the installation when dialog returns.

defect.title: Swi Observer processor leaves with an undefined error number

relnotes.defect: The error code -999 is changed to KErrGeneral in swiobprocessor.cpp.

defect.title: Makesis should mandate source file specification for PA packages

relnotes.defect: Makesis mandate source file specification for PA packages.

defect.title: CDeviceInfoServer::HandleTimeout() fails to cancel fetcher

relnotes.defect: CDeviceInfoServer::HandleTimeout() pass to cancel fetcher

defect.title: Unecessary use of integrity services whilst processing ROM stubs

relnotes.defect: Disable Integrity Services during the processing of ROM stubs.

defect.title: calls to GetDesLength() not checked for error return

relnotes.defect: The call to GetDesLength() API is checked and error handled appropriately.

defect.title: calls to GetDesLength() not checked for error return

relnotes.defect: The length of the descriptor is checked and error handled appropriately.

defect.title: Uninstallation Failed

relnotes.defect: Scanning of ROM based SIS stub files when uninstalling changed to cope with and skip over malformed stub files.

defect.title: !InstallServer crashes with panic USER 23

relnotes.defect: InstallServer won't crash with panic USER 23

defect.title: Not possible to determine all drives which are installed to

relnotes.defect: SISRegistry is able to determine all the drives on which files are installed.

defect.title: SWI prevents developers from changing the name of a package

relnotes.defect: SWI allows upgrade with different pkg name for SA.

defect.title: In source API documentation update for RSisRegistryEntry::FilesL()

relnotes.defect: Enhance API comments for RSisRegistryEntry::FilesL() regarding wildcard file specifications in packages in ROM stub sis files.

defect.title: Security tools do not support Basque and Galician languages

relnotes.defect: Added support for BASQUE and GALICIAN to makesis, signsis, dumpsis and interpretsis.

defect.title: swi fails with -2 when called without driver letter is the sis path name

relnotes.defect: SWI console will now accept a sis file without the drive letter in it's path. Sishelper will attempt to discover which drive the sis file is on.

defect.title: !SISHELPER crashes with panic USER 47

relnotes.defect: SISHELPER won't crash with panic 47 for tempered sis files when it changes the uncompression length to any negative value.

defect.title: Inefficient use of RFs::Volume in processing of ROM stubs in SIS registry

relnotes.defect: Improve efficiency of SisRegistry when processing ROM stubs. Directly set the iDrives bitmask to the Z Drive and improve the use of the RFs in CSisRegistryObject::UpdateDrivesL().

defect.title: SIS registry processing of SIDs in ROM stubs is inefficient

relnotes.defect: Improve efficiency of SisRegistry when processing ROM stubs. RFs::Entry should only be called on an executable rather than all files.

defect.title: RSisRegistrySession::RemovablePackagesL returns ROM stub packages

relnotes.defect: RemovablePackagesL API won't returns the ROM stubs.

defect.title: ECOM dependency on swi/swispubsubdefs.h breaks Core OS layering

relnotes.defect: Updated swi/swispubsubdefs.h to redefine its published KUidSoftwareInstallKey property keys and values in terms of the duplicate definitions in sacls.h from System Agent 2.

defect.title: SisRegistryServer Cache get corrupted in zero disk space conditions

relnotes.defect: Called the CleanUp() when InitFromBackupL() leaves to avoid double entries to the SisRegristry cache.

defect.title: typo in securitypolicy.ini

relnotes.defect: Correction to a typographical error in SWI's config file and the code that reads it.

defect.title: Remove/Ratify TO DO comments from security's test component - tcertstore

relnotes.defect: The deletion of certificate has been modified as part of the fix of to do comments for tcertstore.

defect.title: embedded sis file in conditional block disappear from sisregistry when reinstall

relnotes.defect: Embedded sis file remains in sisregistry after reinstall.

defect.title: Problem with CR1027 ROM application update with SA SIS

relnotes.defect: When SA_RU(ROM upgradeable SA) package upgrades on top of another SA_RU, eclipseable files list is populated directly from stub file itself. Instead of populating it from the SIS registry entries, which is in the case of normal upgrades.

defect.title: Untrusted embedded sis should be rejected if swipolicy doesn't allow unsigned

relnotes.defect: untrusted embedded sis with protected package UID is rejected if AllowUnsigned flag is false.

defect.title: Redundant forward declaration in swiobserverplugin.h

relnotes.defect: Redundant forward declaration of class CSwiObserverPluginManager has been removed.

defect.title: IPR errors in security_ups.mrp

relnotes.defect: Move UPS configuration code to security_config and SWI observer plugni to security_swi.

defect.title: Sis installation inconsistency when media card is removed during installation

relnotes.defect: Stop integrityservices committing if the removable drive is present.

defect.title: PA packages that contain file names with hardcoded e: drive won't work if memo

relnotes.defect: Now rewrite drive letters from e: to the drive letter where the SIS file resides, for PA and PP packages, and install rather than fail

defect.title: CIntegrityTreeNode::DoFindNode() calls User::LeaveIfError

relnotes.defect: A non-leaving function was using LeaveIfError - fixed to use a return code.

defect.title: Wrong OCSP behaviour while installing sis package signed by two certificate chai

relnotes.defect: In CSecurityManager::ProcessOcspOutcomes(), fixed the chainWorstOutcome to record the chain result properly.

defect.title: TCB can be made a user grantable capability

relnotes.defect: A validation has been added in CSecurityPolicy::AddUserCapability, such that, TCB can not be configured as user grantable from SWI policy INI file.

deliverystep.name: PREQ1262: Crypto Services: User Prompt Service (Phase 2a)

preq.title: Service for Run-time User Permission Prompts

deliverystep.preq: SWI is updated to notify registered parties about the results of software install events.

defect.title: [System Build]:Errors and warnings in GT related to security_swi in M04322 v9.4

relnotes.defect: SWI Observer functionality is now conditionally compiled using the SYMBIAN_USER_PROMPT_SERVICE variability macro. This is because SWI Observer is part of PREQ1262 which is only included in 9.5 and later builds

defect.title: SWI does not supply logging

relnotes.defect: SWI now logs install and uninstall events internally. This is enabled by adding MaxNumOfLogEnteries=N to swipolicy.ini where N is the maximum number of entries. The default is 0. This log can be accessed via RSisRegistrySession::RetrieveLogFileL()

defect.title: CCompressedDataProvider::Read() calls InflateL()

relnotes.defect: Error handling mechanism is imporved in non-leaving function CCompressedDataProvider::Read()

defect.title: IMPORT_C/EXPORT_C: sisregistrytoken.h:

relnotes.defect: CSisRegistryToken::SetFixedDrives() is now properly exported

defect.title: IMPORT_C/EXPORT_C: sisregistrypackage.h

relnotes.defect: Class destructor ~CSisRegistryPackage() is now properly exported

defect.title: IMPORT_C/EXPORT_C: sisfield.h:

relnotes.defect: CField::Length() is now properly exported

defect.title: IMPORT_C/EXPORT_C: securitypolicy.h:

relnotes.defect: CSecurityPolicy::AllowUnsigned(), CSecurityPolicy::MandateCodesigningExtension() and CSecurityPolicy::MandateCertificatePolicies() now properly exported

defect.title: IMPORT_C/EXPORT_C: msisuihandlers.h

relnotes.defect: CCertificateInfo::NewL(), CCertificateInfo::NewLC(), CAppInfo::NewL() and CAppInfo::NewLC() now properly exported. Also, CAppInfo::InternalizeL(0 and CAppInfo::ExternalizeL() now properly exported

defect.title: CR1023 should also check for stubs ending sisx

relnotes.defect: ListL modified to list files ending with .sisx extension also.

defect.title: Swi::UninstalledSisPackages::ListL missing pkg file

relnotes.defect: Hashes of the controllers are calculated and compared with the existing list so that ListL won't miss any package.

defect.title: SWI stub name generation problem

relnotes.defect: Swi stub name generation is modified for propogation.

defect.title: SWI Daemon fails to install upgrade packages

relnotes.defect: Swi Daemon will allow to upgrade packages.

defect.title: Native install monitor will panic if there is an error reading the install key

relnotes.defect: Call SetActive() prior to iSwisProperty.Subscribe(iStatus) to avoid potential system panic.

deliverystep.name: EC073: Security: Crypto Services Header File Refactoring

ec.title: Crypto Services Header File Refactoring (to simplify the SDK creation process)

deliverystep.ec: Non-exported published functions made internal. Status added to published files if it was missing. Some classes made publishedPartner from internal because it was referenced from a publishedPartner interface.

deliverystep.name: Security - Alignment of CBR and System Model components

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model components

deliverystep.preq: Tools are removed from swi and splitted into three more components namely pctools,devicetools and sistools.

defect.title: SIS preinstallation is much slowlier in 3.1 platform compared to 3.0

relnotes.defect: Folding most of the functionality of CPostrequisitesChecker::IsFileOrphanedL() into the main function CPostrequisitesChecker::WouldOverWriteL().

defect.title: Missing non-removable flag in THeadOpt enum for CSISFieldRoot

relnotes.defect: Added the missing EOptNonRemovable flag to the THeadOpt enum.

defect.title: Un-initialised variable in CInstallationPlanner::ProcessControllerL()

relnotes.defect: Added variable initialization in CInstallationPlanner::ProcessControllerL to remove static code analysis warning.

defect.title: Security test switermination.htm fails

relnotes.defect: Added code to close all handles when removing a registry entry

defect.title: Error handling in Sisregristry Server Regenerate Cache should be revised

relnotes.defect: When CIntegrityServices::CommitL() Leaves, we need to propagate the error up to the calling method regardless it is temperamental or permanent failure.

defect.title: Linux, debug version of Signsis is not getting build.

relnotes.defect: Signsis Debug version will build on Linux

defect.title: HiQTC BB 4.20 Crash when installing BB and cancelling the setup at status 95%...

relnotes.defect: When a sisregistry entry is not registered, it should not panic when sisregistry server try to regenerate it. In CSisRegistryCache::RegisterInRomControllerL(), change to use RF::Replace() instead; as the .ctl file might exist.

defect.title: Swi::UninstalledSisPackages::ListL returns -10281

relnotes.defect: Fixed Swi::UninstalledSisPackages::ListL to return KErrNone (with list count of zero) when no packages are found.

defect.title: PackageExistsInRomL should be part of RSisRegistryWritableSession

relnotes.defect: The method PackageExistsInRomL() has been moved from publishes partner class RSisRegistrySession to the internal component class RSisRegistryWritableSession.

defect.title: panicscan.pl failed in swicaptests_epocwind.txt

relnotes.defect: Fixed a memory leak in OCSP Support server - it did not deinitialize the ECOM session on shutdown.

cr.title: Uninstallation without installation and CSisRegistryPackage parser function
Wildcard Support in ROM Stub SIS Files

relnotes.cr: Wildcard Support in ROM Stub SIS Files

cr.title: ROM application update with SA SIS

relnotes.cr: ROM application update with SA SIS

ec.title: Improved SWI Integrity Support (provision of external recovery interface)

relnotes.ec: Improved SWI Integrity Support (provision of external recovery interface)

defect.title: makesis crashes if a trailing comma is present on an install-file

relnotes.defect: Fixed a defect where makesis crashed if a comma was present at the end of the .pkg file.

defect.title: makesis errors if the output filename is a single character (plus extension)

relnotes.defect: Fixed a defect where a SIS with filename of the form "?.sis" could not be created

defect.title: Dependency on embedded packages fails

relnotes.defect: In the prerequisite state, the Dependencies are searched across the whole SIS file instead of the current SIS.

defect.title: Makesis -d option doesnt work for language dependent files

relnotes.defect: Makesis will work with -d option for language dependent files in .pkg.

defect.title: SisRegistry API's don't document capability requirements

relnotes.defect: Documented required capabilies for RSisRegistrySession.

defect.title: Incorrect tools configuration in swi/group/bld.inf

relnotes.defect: Tools2 will not build the symbian test code.

defect.title: check behaviour of CSisRegistryCache::RegisterInRomControllerL

relnotes.defect: Corrected minor issues caused by the fix for PDEF107352

defect.title: Security test tswi\tinterpretsisinteg\runtest.pl fails

relnotes.defect: Path issues and solved file casing errors as per the note added

defect.title: Security test swi/test/tinterpretsisinteg/runtest.pl hangs

relnotes.defect: Security test swi/test/tinterpretsisinteg/runtest.pl hangs

defect.title: ROM eclipsing not working always (for Mobile Search)

relnotes.defect: Increased the maximum size of stub sis that can be processed in sisregistryserver before it runs out of memory.

defect.title: Lint errors in security code should be fixed (production and test)

relnotes.defect: Minor changes to remove lint errors

defect.title: SWI does not kill the running application for FR,RR,RW sis files

relnotes.defect: RunWaitTimeoutSeconds option within the swipolicy.ini file is now accurate to the second

defect.title: DumpSIS always appends RW in the recreated pkg file .

relnotes.defect: Removed a conditional statement wherein WaitEnd was ORed to the options which resulted in RW being appended in the recreated pkg file through dumpsis.

defect.title: Software install registry crashes with array out of bounds

relnotes.defect: Fixed panic USER 130 (array out of bounds) from sisregistryserver.exe when installing jar file while out of memory on C drive.

defect.title: One test in testmakesis.pl fails in linux.

relnotes.defect: Conversion of target sis file path(destination) provided as arguement, consisting backward slashes to forward slash. Since linux understands forward slashes in the path.

defect.title: Dumpswicertstoretool with -y option doesn't shows the capability properly.

relnotes.defect: A new option (-d) has been added which displayes the capabilities in readable format, the existing -y option has been deprecated.

defect.title: Capabilities requirements in SisRegistry server need to be reviewed

relnotes.defect: Revised capabilities in SisRegistry, quite a few calls required ReadUserData, while they should not.

cr.title: Control ordering of uninstall RUNREMOVE action

relnotes.cr: Introduced a new uninstall option flag RBS in SWI , to control ordering of RR action.

defect.title: Sisx uninstallation is crashing !InstallServer

relnotes.defect: Fixed panic USER: 130 in integrityservice.dll which crashed InstallServer under some OOM situations.

defect.title: Test failure in testsignsis.pl

relnotes.defect: Path of sis file reference changed as the sis file is being deleted from the old path before this test executes.

defect.title: Combine steps in CSisHelperServer::MainPackageEntryL

relnotes.defect: Changed SisHelper implementation for better usage of SisRegistry interface. Changed capabilities verification in SisRegistry to prevent regressions. Added swicaptest to ROM tests.

defect.title: Test failure in testChainValidity.pl

relnotes.defect: selfsigned.sis is replaced by itself signed with the new certificate and the selfsigned.out file updated with the new certificate detials as well.

defect.title: Makesis SetDirectory implementation should be improved.

relnotes.defect: Makesis SetDirectory function implementation is optimized.

defect.title: Dependency dialog in SWI should be localized according to user settings

relnotes.defect: Localized "missing dependency" dialog
relnotes.minorchange: Fixed a debug print in test code.
relnotes.preq: TOOLS2 platform is added with TOOLS , makesis and signsis is ported to build and run with MinGW and Linux platform.

defect.title: Investigate TO DO comments in SWI source

relnotes.defect: Removed more obsolete comments from SWI

defect.title: Investigate TO DO comments in SWI source

relnotes.defect: Removed obsolete TO DO statements from installationplanner.cpp, .h

defect.title: Investigate TO DO comments in SWI source

relnotes.defect: Removed obsolete comments in bld.inf and appgen.pm.

defect.title: move installserverclient.cpp to uiss

relnotes.defect: Moved installclientserver.cpp from swi\source\swis\server to swi\source\uiss\server

defect.title: test failures in test-preinstalled, testasynccaps, testeclipseemulater

relnotes.defect: Fixed shutdown timeouts in SisHelper.

defect.title: Combine steps in CSisHelperServer::MainPackageEntryL

relnotes.defect: Changed internals of CSisHelperServer::MainPackageEntryL to combine a couple of steps into a single function call. No external impact.

ec.title: Triage and address Coverity Errors in Security Subsystem

relnotes.ec: Fixed: 1. Two if (iRestoreMachine == NULL) conditions have been modified in the CInstallSession::ServiceL() method in order not to dereference these zero pointers. 2. Modified the CSecurityManager::VerifyBlockL() method because the certChain variable was unused. 3. Modified the CRestoreMachine::ConstructL() method in order to check that the iFs.MkDirAll(path) call finishes successfully.

defect.title: add capabilities to dialog message in CInstallMachine

relnotes.defect: An error message is displayed when an installation fails due to capabilities. This error message is updated to include the list of problem capabilities.

defect.title: Test build failure in builds after the submission pdef102493

relnotes.defect: namespace is included with the enum to avoid test build errors

defect.title: InstallServer has no version no defined for BC

relnotes.defect: Added a version no for Install Server.

defect.title: SWI fails in case of embedded or double dependency

relnotes.defect: Allows base packages and their upgrades to be combined in single a wrapper package and resolves double dependency problems. Multiple embedded partial upgrades are supported but multiple embedded SA/SP upgrades are not allowed.
relnotes.preq: Changed according to filename policy to support the building of Symbian OS on both Windows and Linux for the test code.

defect.title: Installserver stack usage needs to be investigated

relnotes.defect: installserver.exe stack usage reduced around 2KB by removing unnecessary stack variables.

defect.title: Dumpsis not working for Unicode named sis files

relnotes.defect: Dumpsis provides unicode support.

defect.title: Test Failure in Testmakesis.pl

relnotes.defect: Fixed failure in testMakesis.pl by adding a simple while loop in the windows script file, that waits for the asynchronous execution to get over.

defect.title: Secourity test failures after submission of DEF090812 FBServ Heap ...

relnotes.defect: Fix for test panics after FBserv defect fix
relnotes.minorchange: Naiad Quality plan to improve the test coverage and to reduce the defect level in the production code

defect.title: Cannot restore signed application

relnotes.defect: Added support to configure phone TSY name in swipolicy.ini. This configuration enables SWI to restore the applications signed by developer certificates with IEME constraint.

defect.title: Native software installation policy may be subverted

relnotes.defect: Added lock on swipolicy.ini in SWI daemon to prevent potential exclusive locks on the file.
relnotes.minorchange: Removed unnecessary test SIS files added for DEF100499

defect.title: Makesis & SWI assumes system drive is c:

relnotes.defect: Removed hardcoded references to C drive and replaced with system drive.

defect.title: SWI has poor performance during uninstall

relnotes.defect: Optimized processing of directories in Integrity Services for faster uninstallation in packages with many private files.

defect.title: BT 3SK Dialog.BT.selectDevices wrong CSK command when checkbox is marked

relnotes.defect: Fixed behaviour of embedded updates inside partial upgrades and SPs.

defect.title: Defect in the SWI::DataProvider CCafSisDataProvider::DataL ()

relnotes.defect: Removed leave from DataL() assessor function in CCafSisDataProvider which could cause non-leaving methods to leave.

defect.title: documentation defect in swi name space

relnotes.defect: Documentation of software install API are modified as per documentation standard.

defect.title: Controller verify returns wrong result if SIS package is self signed.

relnotes.defect: INC100928 (Controller verify returns wrong result if SIS package is self signed.): All the controllers will be verified only with the certificate array passed to RSisRegistryEntry::VerifyControllerSignatureL function.

defect.title: sisregistryserver crashes if swipolicy.ini file is missing

relnotes.defect: Default values now used if there is no swipolicy.ini file.

defect.title: [BR2021] SWI does not check for subst'd drives

relnotes.defect: [BR2021] Substituted drives will not be displayed during installation.

defect.title: SWI Launcher UISS/SIS thread handle ownership and shutdown broken.

relnotes.defect: Modified synchronous installation to wait for the SisHelper thread exits before completing installation request in case of either success or cancellation.

defect.title: Two minor issues in dessisdataprovider.cpp

relnotes.defect: Missing default cluase has been added to the switch-case control of CDesDataProvider::Seek() method, to handle the invalid input parameters.

defect.title: Remove Security InstallApp

relnotes.defect: Remove InstallApp UI from Security test build; as it will be included as a standard app in Techview.

defect.title: Documentation for SWI could be improved.

relnotes.defect: Added the documentation comment for calling REComSession::FinalClose() as a part of cleanup at the following places. Description of class Launcher( @publishedPartner,@released ) , Launcher::Install() and MInstallerUiHandler::DisplayInstallL() ( @publishedPartner,@released )

defect.title: Documentation defect - no documentation for SWI installer error codes

relnotes.defect: Added doxygen documentation for error codes.

defect.title: CCompressedDataProvider does not behave according to MSisDataProvider doc.

relnotes.defect: Modified CCompressedDataProvider::Read to adhere to documentation of MSisDataProvider interface

defect.title: CDesDataProvider::Read() functions do not behave according to documentation

relnotes.defect: Added checksum verification of SISX header in SISX recognizer.

defect.title: Documentaion defect in MSisDataProvider interface.

relnotes.defect: Added documentation to MSisDataProvider::Read functions.

defect.title: The phone displays "Program closed: !SISHELPER" after removing memory card from

relnotes.defect: Modified asynchronous installation to wait for the SisHelper thread exits before completing installation request in case of either success or cancellation.

defect.title: SWI update caused regression in SP and ECOM hardware tests

relnotes.defect: Added new checks for memory allocations to make the log.h code more rigid

defect.title: Defect in the SWI::DataProvider

relnotes.defect: Modified the CDesDataProvider::Seek(TSeek aMode, TInt64& aPos) function in dessisdataprovider.cpp in order to accept aPos=0 for aMode=ESeekEnd. Added additional comment to this function in the dessisdataprovider.h file.

defect.title: Minor change required in SISHelper. Change EXPORT_C to IMPORT_C

relnotes.defect: Modified EXPORT_C to IMPORT_C in sishelper.h

defect.title: Incorrect dumpsis device ID format

relnotes.defect: Added the missing commas in sistargetdependency.cpp to rectify the incorrect depenedency field in package file regenerated by dumpsis.

defect.title: Warnings during rombuild.txt

relnotes.defect: Cleaned some warnings during rom build.

defect.title: SWI fails to complete SP Upgrade in hardware UDEB build

relnotes.defect: Decreased the amount of stack memory used by the SWI debug log printing functions.

defect.title: Restore fails when sisregistry folder is not available

relnotes.defect: When some registry files are missing whole install or uninstall process will not be halted.

defect.title: DP: testappinuse.htm: 4 tests failed out of 77

relnotes.defect: Increases the re-create timeout to 0.08 sec. in CSisHelperServer::StartSisHelper() to fix DP test failures in testappinuse.htm

defect.title: Application Installer panics when sis version number is invalid

relnotes.defect: SIS version check added to makesis
